    • Constructor Detail

      • Game

        public Game(boolean createUI,
            int width,
            int height,
            int red,
            int blue)
     throws java.lang.Exception
        Initializes a new game instance
        Parameters:
        createUI - Whether or not to create a GUI, if false Stdout is used
        width - Width of the game
        height - Height of the game
        red - Player type for redPlayer, must be value of Game.PLAYER_*
        blue - Player type for bluePlayer, must be value of Game.PLAYER_*
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • Game

        public Game(boolean createUI,
            int width,
            int height,
            int red,
            int blue,
            java.lang.String rmiHost,
            java.lang.String redRMI,
            java.lang.String blueRMI,
            boolean hostRed)
     throws java.lang.Exception
        Initializes a new game instance with NetPlayer initialization ability
        Parameters:
        createUI - Whether or not to create a GUI, if false Stdout is used
        width - Width of the game
        height - Height of the game
        red - Player type for redPlayer, must be value of Game.PLAYER_*
        blue - Player type for bluePlayer, must be value of Game.PLAYER_*
        rmiHost - RMI host to use for network players, pass null for local game
        redRMI - RMI path to use if redPlayer is a network player, network mode ignored when null
        blueRMI - RMI path to use if bluePlayer is a network player, network mode ignored when null
        hostRed - True if this game instance should host redPlayer player, ignored when any network name is null
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • Game

        private Game(boolean createUI,
             int w,
             int h)
      throws PresetException
        Basic game initialization, private use only
        Parameters:
        createUI - Create new GUI
        w - Width
        h - Height
        Throws:
        PresetException

        Returns:

      • play

        public int play(int rounds)
         throws PresetException
        Play rounds Rounds
        Parameters:
        rounds - Number of rounds to play, -1 for indefinite
        Returns:
        If the game is finished or invalid.
        Throws:
        PresetException
